Text: Tried on 2 PC's, one with Windows 7 Ultimate 32bit. One with WinXPSP3. All the menu's and text boxes are blank.
same here, no text on buttons in game - very hard to play it this way, undoable
update: I downloaded the mac version (BigFish) of the game, copied the 'data' folder over to the game dir, and now the game works (on W7x64) with text on buttons and dialogs! I am playing.
